receiptStandards.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office_supplies, Equipment, Training, Telecommunications, Mileage, Transportation
receiptStandards.rule: Date of the expense must be clearly visible on the receipt

receiptStandards.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office_supplies, Equipment, Training, Telecommunications, Mileage, Transportation
receiptStandards.rule: Expense type or description of goods/services purchased must be shown on the receipt

receiptStandards.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office_supplies, Equipment, Training, Telecommunications, Mileage, Transportation
receiptStandards.rule: Total amount of the expense must be clearly displayed on the receipt

receiptStandards.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office_supplies, Equipment, Training, Telecommunications, Mileage, Transportation
receiptStandards.rule: Name of the vendor or merchant must be visible on the receipt
VAT amount must be listed clearly on the invoice if applicable

receiptStandards.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office_supplies, Equipment, Training, Telecommunications
receiptStandards.rule: Invoice in the name of the employer wherever possible. Name of local entity of GoGlobal that employs the worker

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: Business expenses related to workers completing their job will usually be tax exempt. Only purely business related elements of an expense will be tax free
There are no set government per diem rates but employer can set their own to be used to cover meals, which will be treated as non-taxable income up to 200,000 KRW per month

Mileage reimbursement rates between 50 to 80 cents per mile is common. If employee uses own vehicle and submits receipts only, entire amount is non-taxable. If employee claims both receipts and mileage reimbursement, the mileage reimbursement is fully subject to taxation as an allowance
Per diem will be taxable. Any other set daily allowance which is not paid against receipts will be taxable

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office_supplies, Equipment, Training, Telecommunications, Mileage, Transportation
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Business purpose must be established and clearly documented for all expenses

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office_supplies, Equipment, Training, Telecommunications, Mileage, Transportation
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Expenses must be submitted with clear and legible copies of receipts, properly labeled for identification

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office_supplies, Equipment, Training, Telecommunications, Mileage, Transportation
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Itemized expense reports required along with clear receipts

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office_supplies, Equipment, Training, Telecommunications, Mileage, Transportation
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Client line manager approval required before payroll cutoff date
For foreign currency expenses, convert amount to local currency and include currency type and exchange rate used
For mileage reimbursements, include To and From locations, distance travelled and per diem rates

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office_supplies, Equipment, Training, Telecommunications, Mileage, Transportation
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Receipts and invoices must be submitted with expenses. Online copies are sufficient, hard copy not required but workers should keep these filed

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office_supplies, Equipment, Training, Telecommunications, Mileage, Transportation
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Workers details can be used on the invoice or the Local Employer's details. Addresses do not need to be provided

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office_supplies, Equipment, Training, Telecommunications, Mileage, Transportation
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Any personal information not required for reimbursement purposes should be removed before submission
